title: Welcome
text:
I am a student at Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT), currently taking
Bachelor of Science with Honours in Applied Computing with a specialisation in Fintech.
I am particularly interested in how blockchain can improve transparency, security, and efficiency in areas such as digital payments, decentralised finance (DeFi), and financial data management.







My Photo



I enjoy learning new technical skills related to data, programming, and visualisation. Through this module, I aim to improve my ability to:

Understand real-world datasets

Apply data engineering concepts

Create clear and effective visualisations





This GitHub Pages site is created as part of Assessment 1.
It serves as:

My personal course website

A platform to present data visualisation work

A record of my learning journey in AAI1001
A Showcase more about myself, including my academic interests and career aspirations in FinTech and blockchain
